data.name: 0000 (190.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: The saying goes, "The true form of a ghost is withered silver grass," right?

data.name: 0001 (190.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: It means that when you're scared, everything looks suspicious.

data.name: 0002 (190.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Seems to happen to you a lot, right Mikuru?

data.name: 0003 (190.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: Err… I guess so.

data.name: 0004 (190.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: What about it?

data.name: 0005 (190.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: Well Koizumi told me that the world's unnatural phenomena are just made up…

data.name: 0006 (190.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Sure thing—like how the famous photo of the Loch Ness Monster was revealed to be fake.

data.name: 0007 (190.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: I think there're lots of nonsense rumors out there.

data.name: 0008 (190.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: Then, things like ghosts don't exist right?

data.name: 0009 (190.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Who knows?

data.name: 0010 (190.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: B-but, their true form is just withered silver grass right?

data.name: 0011 (190.ja) KYON_SIS (妹)
data.value: What's withered silver grass?

data.name: 0012 (190.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: It's what you get when the tips of pampas grass wither away.

data.name: 0013 (190.ja) KYON_SIS (妹)
data.value: Grass is ghosts?

data.name: 0014 (190.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: If you're expecting a ghost to come out, even grass can look like one.

data.name: 0015 (190.ja) KYON_SIS (妹)
data.value: I don't see it—grass is grass!

data.name: 0016 (190.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: You wouldn't see it. You're not a scaredy-cat after all.

data.name: 0017 (190.ja) KYON_SIS (妹)
data.value: Nope—

data.name: 0018 (190.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: Ehh—am I the only one that's scared enough to start seeing things?

data.name: 0019 (190.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Baseless rumors and seeing things, I think that's actually pretty common.

data.name: 0020 (190.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: But that's not 100% always the case. I believe there are undiscovered mysteries as well.

data.name: 0021 (190.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: I'd rather it be 100%, though…

data.name: 0022 (190.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: That's what I call a boring life.

data.name: 0023 (190.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: It's more fun to be scared as well, somtimes.

data.name: 0024 (190.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: I don't think its fun!

data.name: 0025 (190.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Really? A life of 100% safety and peace of mind would be unbelievably boring, wouldn' it?

data.name: 0026 (190.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Excitement is important in life.

data.name: 0027 (190.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: In that sense, Mikuru has the most exciting life out of any of us, right?

data.name: 0028 (190.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: Ehh? I do?

data.name: 0029 (190.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: The more you're a scaredy-cat, the more the excitement. It's a trait with valuable benefits.

data.name: 0030 (190.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: I don't need that kind of benefit at all!

data.name: 0031 (190.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: I'm starting to become a little jealous.

data.name: 0032 (190.ja) KYON_SIS (妹)
data.value: A little jealous—

data.name: 0033 (190.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: Ehhh? No way!
